name: Come Out！Dragon
description:
This is a classic Idle PRG game. Let you find your childhood passion and become a superhero Looking forward to your joining the Super Saiyan Base camp. Find a different passion together

【Full of vitality strategy introduction】
*You can match the formation according to your favorite characters and play the camp attributes
*You can also draw cards to collect your favorite characters
*And each character has a different soul bonds
*When we have collected 7dragon balls, we can make a wish to the Dragon God and get a different surprise
*Let's work together to protect the peace and justice of the universe. Use our power to overcome the darkness looking. forwardS to your joining. Let's fight together

Game Features
【No timed tasks to get rid of shackles】
*The game does not set the task to get rid of the sense of oppression no need to worry about missing activities to reduce revenue, allowing you to experience the joy of efficient gaming

【Mix and match between different camps】
*The lineup pairing mechanism has evolved in a comprehensively way and the character has become a fetter Players are encouraged to freely mix and match lineups according to the skill effects of the generals

【Popular characters Free to cultivate】
*More than one hundred popular characters are cultivated freely, with customized personality camp collocation Each character has their attributes and skills it can activate the surprise effect more, and turn the tide of war at the critical. moment

【Refuse to work role training is simple】
*Hang up offline to collect more resources gamer worker
